__e: He is a man with an evil heart and an appetite to kill.
He was too young at the time ... but I was wicked and did not know any better.
If I ever met an evil man, it's him.
You really are as dark as people say.
But before that, he wasn't evil, and neither are you.
If this lieutenant is as bad as you say he is... how can you still be his wife?
And what can be more evil than that?
Not by the police, by something even more evil than they were.
Who's to say he's any more evil than I am?
If an evil man hates him... does it make your father a good man?
What, is there something nasty after my dad?
I'd try and stay good, but I was weak. ...and sooner or later I'd do something evil and get sent right back in.
